mapper.select: SELECT id, menu_name AS menuName, english_name AS englishName, menu_logo AS menuLogo, menu_current_logo AS menuCurrentLogo, review_hidden AS reviewHidden, STATUS FROM sys_member_menu WHERE del_flag = 0 AND `status` = '1' AND review_hidden = '1' OR menu_type = '1' ORDER BY sort ASC, update_time DESC, create_time DESC
